column2: objectivedescription
Technology Development Programmes
Development Missions (New missions - Launch vehicles and satellites including demonstrators)
Applications: New development Projects/Programmes
Project Activities - LV & Satellite Mission (Service/User missions)
Applications: National / User Projects
New Technical Facilities establishment (Files requiring approval of DOS as per delegation of financial powers)
Mission operation support for relevant Centres/Units only
Number of Papers expected to be published (Published or listed in SCI)
Number of Patents/Trade markers/Design/Copy rights Planned
Internal Reports - Technical/Project (With library document number - list to be enclosed)
Expenditure Expected against BE allocations
Number of POs released - FE (Files required approval of Director)
Number of POs released - Local (Files required approval of Director)
Number of recruitments planned (Centre specific recruitments only)
No of Training conducted for External Users/Academia (Project Trainees, interns)/Researchers/etc. as part of capacity building /Outreach programme (For external people only)
Technical Support for Start-ups/NGPEs (JPIP Signed)
External Awards/Recognition received by Individual/Groups in Centre/Unit (Does not include fellowships)
Technology Transfer to Industries through NSIL

What is the number of outside researchers supported who undertook research at Centre/Unit Outside researchers include college teachers, university faculty, doctoral students, scientist from other institutions and industry, including RESPOND & STC projects
What percentage of the total salary budget of your Centre/Unit is spent on training (Re-skilled and upskilled) of your staff (Including sponsored higher studies)?
Number of employees trained (Permanent staff of Centre/Unit)
Membership/Fellowships received by individual in professional bodies
Reports generated for PMO/MoS/Parliament/Cabinet Secretary/Other Ministries, etc
Coordination with other Ministries/Departments (Record of discussion mandatory)
Overall DOS expenditure with respect to Voted
Number of policy papers generated (For HQ only - Technical, Administrative, Managerial)
PMC Meeting
SPAC 1 and 2 meetings
ISRO Council Meetings
Space Council Meetings
Space Commission Meetings
Other major hight level meeting / Reports/Proposal Notes/Strategy plans/Roadmaps generation, etc
Other parameters of relevance to Centre/Units with the approval of respective Centre/Unit Council for consideration by DOS/ISRO HQ/Apex Committee may be defined with suitable justification
